displayServletURL

public static java.lang.String displayServletURL(java.net.URL u)
Displays servlet URLs in a form suitable for including in error messages etc. (The idea is not to show the full URL because then maybe users will click it.)

Parameters:
u - Actual URL
Returns:
String displaying the servlet context @ hostname
